title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.9 - Conduct of the hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.9 - Conduct of the hearing

State Regulations

At the hearing the complainant and the respondent may appear personally or otherwise and shall have the right of counsel, to cross-examine witnesses and to produce evidence and witnesses in his or its behalf. Thew technical rules of evidence shall be dispensed with in the conduct of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
95.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
